feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -28.8°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
